1.content:
Will you choose Amanda or Sydney?



NOTE : Please write the chapters in first person view,please try to refrain from cursing, but should you, keep the cursing only restricted to "hell" and "damn", and no gay/lesbian content. Also, no shrinking guys past eye level with their boobs. Thank you.
1.title: So, who's it going to be?

choices: I take him to the back to punish him alone
Destiny and I take him to the back together and punish him
I trap him somewhere he can't get out alone
I throw him in the pool
11.content:
"I'm sick of this class" I whispered, as I looked over to my 5'2" identical twin sister, Sarah. "I'm bored out of my mind, and I can't shrink anyone here to keep me entertained because I'll get expelled. This sucks!"
"Listen, we only have 15 more minutes, and then we'll go home and hang out there until the party starts. You can manage."
"Ugh, I guess…" I say, as I focus on Faith, the tallest of three girl identical triplets, as I manage to shrink her by one inch. She is 4'11", Hope, one of her sister, is 4'10", and Destiny is 4'9". My sister and I always got along with them, but I always felt left out when we go over each other's house and share clothes (until I shrink down, of course). Anyways, so she wouldn't notice I shrank her during class, I shrank everything with her. I shrank her pen, her desk, her dress, and pretty much everything else. The only things I didn't shrink was her bag, and her headband. I like being even inches taller than people, so I constantly shrink her until she notices. I've learned to shrink her desk too, because other wise her feet won't be touching the ground and she'll immediately notice. Since Destiny is short enough to where she doesn't touch the ground, I only shrank her and her clothes by an inch, so Faith won't notice she's only an inch taller. The two tallest of the trio are brunette, and the shortest one is blonde, so we generally refer to her as "Barbie" since she's the tiniest. It doesn't really help her case since she's always wearing pink, either. The triplets, along with my sister and I, are all cheerleaders. Due to their little stature, they're all flyers. I'm Destiny's base, so she trust me with her life. Because of this, she's naturally my best friend of the three, and I enjoy talking to her more than anyone, even my own sister. She's also the only one of the three that doesn't mind being shrunken down whenever. She actually seems to like it.
After class, we had a 2 hour cheer practice, and both Destiny and Faith didn't notice they were shrunken, even when their cheer clothes and shoes didn't fit properly.
After practice we all carpooled back to my house and we all showered at got dress to go to the party. I wore a gold sequin skirt and a loose black top. About an hour and a half way through the party, I was getting myself some more soda, and some guy, probably around 5'5" to 5'4", comes up to me and says "You're really hot, but too tall for me." He looks a little downwards at my boobs, and says "But, you're big enough to make up for that, so let's give it a go, shall we?"
I look at his face with a look of disgust, and said "Excuse me?! Do you think I would ever go out with a a pig like you?" I began shrinking him down to where he was about up to my stomach. I bent over and said "if I was too tall before, what am I now, little man?"
He stuck out his little arms, in hope of trying to grab my massive-to-him boobs and said "now you're just perfect!" with his eyes wide open, staring in my shirt. Luckily my bra covered everything up and all he saw was cleavage.
I stood up slapped his little face, with my hand which easily covered his whole face and sent him hurling towards the ground. I guess I forgot how easy it was to dominate a 3 feet something guy. While he was getting up, I saw Destiny come over and stand behind him. She easily towered him too.
He got up with his hand on his face where I slapped him and yelled "you big bitch!" At this point Destiny easily pushed him over and he laid flat down with his stomach on the ground while she said "Watch your mouth, little guy!" At this point…
11.title: Amanda

113.content:
Destiny gently places her feet on him, preventing him from getting up and asks me "where shall we take him?"
"Hmmm… I think there's an unoccupied room in the back. We should go there." I say to her. She removes her foot, and then picks him up easily with one hand (I shrank him a to about Barbie doll height). She cradles him as we walk to the room. When we get in, we lock the door behind us. I start looking through my purse, while I hear Destiny in the back saying "Aww, is that little bulge in your pants supposed to be a boner? My pinkie toe is so much bigger than that. You're an odd little guy, aren't you? All of this is turning you on, right?" She says, as she drops him on a bed.
"Hey, Des, I'll be right back. I need to get something in the car." I come back about three minutes later. I pull out two tiny pair of heels and grow them to their normal size. I put my pair on, and they make me 6'3", and as Des is putting hers on, I give her the inch back, so she's now 5'1". Destiny take him off the bed, and stomps her right foot so close to him that when the heel hit the ground wind blew his air a little.
"Take off your clothes," she demanded. "But leave your underwear on."
"Wow," I said, "it's almost like you've done this before." That would be impossible. I haven't even done this. I mean, we've talked about what we would do if some douchebag was ever really disrespectful to us, but she seemed like a pro.
"Yeah, well," she started turning to face him, "I'm not gonna let some little jerk get away with being a pig." I think she was enjoying this a lot, usually because she's usually never seen as a giant to anyone. I gave her the pink Barbie dress and she made him put it on. While in the process, I plopped down on the bed beside him, accidentally sending him some inches (feet to him) in the air. He landed on my lap, and I easily brushed him aside, like you would with crumbs. After he finished putting the dress on, we set him on the ground. I crouch down in front of him. Because of the heels, he wasn't even up to my knew caps. Making sure he can't see up my skirt, I said "Don't worry, little guy. You got off easy. You'll grow back in two days, so I hope you didn't have anything important planned this weekend." I started patting him softly on the back, but strong enough to where I'm slowly forcing him out the door to the test of the party.
As we get to the door frame, he looks up and says "Are you kidding me?" Before I even get the chance to answer, Destiny comes out of no where and swings her leg strong enough to where he stumbles out, with out falling. Before we close the door, we see his ex-girlfriend, Tiffany, a 5'3" Asian cheerleader see him, and laugh at him as she walks over to him. She pours her cup of Coca-Cola over his head, and says "you're lucky I'm over you, or I would've picked you up right now and made your life hell." And walks away, leaving him in a giant pool of Coca-Cola.
"Do you think the heels intimidated him like you said you thought it would?" Des asked.
"It did when you stomped like three inches away from him! But, I think he was so small that the heels didn't make much of a difference. But you looked like a pro at that, holy cow!"
"Hahaha ya, I mean, I'm not gonna lie and say I didn't practice…"
we start taking off our heels, and I shrink Destiny again, and I managed to shrink here slyly enough so she didn't notice.
113.title: Destiny and I take him to the back together and...

choices: 3'7" (average size of a 7 year old girl)
1132.content: So, for this chapter, I want the girls to be "locked in" at a certain height, by which the explanation eill be made clear in the same chapter. But, this idea can work for several sizes. Here are three to choose from.
1132.title: Next morning (Saturday)

11322.content:
After the party, we all decide to head back to my and Sarah's house. When I wake up and turn to put my feet on the ground,I didn't touch it. I looked down and immediately knew what was wrong. I jumped down, aiming for a bed, but I guess I wasn't as small as I thought I was, because I woke up Hope, who is also shrunken, when I landed on her mattress. I jumped down off the mattress and started to run through my room, and then Hope calls me, so I look back to see, while I'm running still. She starts screaming because she's so small, and as I start to look forward, I trip over a crazy large bag, and land on a cheerleading outfit.
"How small am I exactly?? This is Destiny's outfit and it's absolutely huge!!" I get up, trying to make my over sized shirt stay on, but I'm so small that it easily falls around me, so I grab Destiny's cheerleading top, since it's the closet, and conveniently the smallest, thing to me. Luckily, it's small enough to where I can leave it resting on one shoulder. I was going to go measure myself, but I decided to help Hope instead.
"Ha ha," she said, trying to cover herself, "You scared me good. Now, turn me back please?"
"Hope, I would if I could. But… we're locked in…" "Locked in" is the expression I use when I temporarily lose my shrinking powers. I'm not entirely sure why or when I lose it, but it seems to be when I dream of shrinking someone or something. I usually gain it back in 2 weeks, or when I dream about shrinking again. I faintly remember my dream. It's something about being half my size. Me, my sister, and the triplets, I think, were all in my dream.
"So… we're stuck like this for two weeks max?! Oh no… this isn't good. I was supposed to meet Kyle (her boyfriend) and play volleyball with him today against that giant Haley. Did you know she's 6-foot-2?? How tall are we now?" She asked.
"I think we're around 2'11". Half my height. Things and people being half my size was a constant theme in my dream. But listen, we should go down stairs to the closet because I might have some clothes that'll fit us." Hope and I get downstairs and we're just baffled at how big everything is. Since she's naturally 4'10" she doesn't like being any shorter, and since I'm naturally 5'10", I love being tall, so we don't shrink that much. I mostly just shrink clothes for my friends if the size isn't small enough, and hardly people when I'm bored. Hope and I needed to climb on top of each other to reach the clothes bin that has clothes shrunken to fit pretty much all sizes. Although we were almost my usual height, my tiny arms couldn't reach the bin.
"I should've thought this through last time I shrank…"
Before we gave up I decided to try and scale up the closet, but since it was full of dresses, I wasn't able to.
"Wait! You said you think all five of us where in your dream. Maybe Destiny or Faith wasn't and is still normal height."
"Hopefully," I said. "While we're up there, I can ask Sarah where the step ladder is. That can help. Plus, I'm tired of wearing this. This would probably should my midriff when I'm normal height. Now it covers my whole body!"
So we go back upstairs, brief Sarah and Faith, and Sarah reveals that the step ladder is in the laundry. We go to my room, and see if Destiny is shrunken. When we remove her blanket, we see that…
11322.title: 2'11" (Half Amanda's height)

113221.content:
"Darn it! This isn't good!" I yelled, waking her up. We explained what is going on, and as soon as I finished, my phone notified me I have a text message. I go and get my iPhone 5 that's charging and say, "Hey, at least the screen isn't small anymore!" and the girls laugh. I read the text, and my 5'9" neighbor girl named Taylor asked if she could come over so we could help her with cheerleading stunts. She's a freshman cheerleader with potential, so we occasionally help her out. Before I answered we all decide on going downstairs to try and get the clothes box. After 10 in minutes, and the help of the step ladder, we finally get the box down. Hope was determined to go play volleyball despite being not even 3 feet tall, so she chose an 80s like neon green work out leggings and a vibrant, hot pink top, complete with the neon green headband. She looked like a little blast from the past. She texted her boyfriend to come pick her up. Meanwhile, I got these boots, jeans (one of the few times in my life I wore jean pants), and a light purple/ almost pinkish flannel button shirt. I looked like a little cow girl, especially when I had the star hat. Since my phone was too big to fit in my pocket, I left it on the floor. Without consulting anyone, I texted Taylor back saying "Sure. We'll try to help. Use the spare key to let yourself in. It's in the same place." About 3 minutes, Taylor came in. When she came in, she was immediately greeted by us 5 tiny little girls on the couch. She didn't say anything at first, because she doesn't know about my shrinking powers yet, but when she finally managed to say something, all she said was "What? How? What is going on? You girls are midgets…"
We told her what happened, but halfway Hope left. It was funny watching her sit next to Taylor, because Taylor was so much bigger than her, even while sitting. When Hope's ride arrived, to all of our surprise, it was Haley, the 6'2" volleyball captain. Hope wasn't even up to her waist when they stood next to each other. We briefed Haley too, but I wasn't really happy to do so. I liked keeping this as much as a secret as possible, because most people always ask me to shrink them or something and usually it just spreads. It was funny watching a two-feet-eleven girl who looks like she's straight out from the 80s (her hair was in a ponytail and everything) walk out with a 6'2" girl, whose monogram gym shorts would be like normal shorts on us. After my explanation, went to go get a drink.
"Hey, can I borrow the iPad Mini? This regular one is waay to big now."
"Ugh, I can't even hold the TV remote with one hand anymore."
"My phone is absolutely huge now!" are among the things you would hear from us, regarding are new height. Taylor comes back scrolling down on her phone, and without looking up, she says, "Did you guys know that 35 inches tall, which is how tall y'all are, in between the average height of 3 and 4 year old girls?" She looks up at us after this fact. I think I knew exactly where she was going with this. She was either going to dominate us with her height, or leave us in peace. We were always nice to her, but we've seen her around school, and how she treated this 5'1" guy who is obsessed with her. Needless to say, she makes fun of how short he is and makes him do stuff for her all the time, so this could go either way for us, especially since we're baby sized.
113221.title: Destiny shrank as well

choices: Tiffany takes us with no problem
She decides to do whatever she wants with us
1132211.content:
"You know, normally I would make you tiny girls my slaves," she says, as she starts walking towards us in her one inch heeled boots. She sits on the sofa, picks me up, places me on her lap, and starts fishtail braiding my hair, with her massive hands and slender fingers. "But, you girls are really nice to me. Plus you could shrink me anytime you got your powers back. Not to mention, I have a request for you to shrink someone. It's my only condition so that I don't become your master for this time period, because I can make it worth it. Trust me. You don't want to have to clean my closet when I have dresses that can cover two of you girls entirely by itself while I stand watch and punish you if you misbehave."
"Well, what's your condition?" I asked.
"So glad you asked, Amanda. I want you to shrink Jake ( the 5'1" guy I told you about) to be one foot shorter than me."
I pretended like I was thinking about it so she wouldn't think I'm desperate and add more for me to shrink. I said yes and she then placed me aside when she finished braiding my hair.
"Plus, I wanna see how you little girls survive this time being so tiny." She placed me in the ground and stood up next to me. Since her heeled boots made her 5'10", I was half her size. When I turned around to face her, all I saw was her crotch. I stared straight up at her, and felt a massive force push me against her. I stopped myself from falling by grabbing her massive leg. "Look! You're the size if my leg! My pants are as tall as you! You must feel so little. Anyways, I'm going back home. Good luck with your new height, ladies. Or, would 'babies' be more appropriate?" She left my house laughing.
After she left, it was quiet for about 5 minutes. I broke the silence by saying, "All right, let's not avoid the elephant in the room. There's no way were gonna make it up to two weeks with the same pair of clothes. We need to do something." After we debated, we decided we needed I go to the mall. We didn't want to call the triplets' parents because they are on a business trip in Russia so we didn't want worry them. My mom was on a vacation and we didn't want to end it early.
"Well, who can we call then?" Sarah asked
"Tiffany might be able to help," I said reluctantly.
"I… I don't know about Tiff. It can go really well with her, or really poorly… if you guys want to take the risk, I'll take it as well," Faith added.
"I mean it's the best shot we have."
"I agree with Destiny."
At this point, we all agreed to ask Tiffany. 30 minutes later she arrived at my house. We talked for a while, and we all decided to leave, and…
1132211.title: She leaves us be

choices: We decide to accept her help
We deny her offer to help us
11322111.content:
We arrive at our local mall and immediately Tiffany ditches us because she saw some of her friends that she hangs out with more.
"You guys can go on ahead and just text me when you're done and we leave then! You guys'll be fine." And she ran off, before we could explain that we need her mainly to reach objects because we're not even 3 feet tall, but we just let it be. It must've been funny to see 4 4-year old looking girls, with mature, normally proportioned bodies walking around the mall. It was definitely weird for me. I saw a bunch of extremely tall business women in 4 inch heels and skirt suits with button up shirts walking around that I'd probably be taller than normally walking around. It must've been their lunch breaks, or they were on coffee runs. Either way, at least 4 stopped, and asked if we had "lost our mommies". I'm not mad at that. I perfectly understand that they were concerned for us, especially since they probably thought we were actual babies. But the part that annoyed me was that they would all do the same pose when asking us; they'd partially bend over, sticking their butt out, put their left hand on their left thigh, while using their right hand to hold their hair back by pressing it against their right shoulder. It's was impressive actually, how they all did it, and made me feel really little. I hated that sensation. That's why I shrink most of the people so that I could feel big and tall. The 4 that stopped to ask were probably surprised, upon further inspection, to see that we weren't actually four years old, based on our bodies. I mean, I buttoned up my shirt in such a manner that it was easy to see my cleavage, especially while looking down at us, so they could know we're not four, but I guess I didn't think it through because who would believe we actually shrank. At one point, I ran into a giant business woman's leg, and I turned around quickly to say sorry, and by the time I turned around, I ran face first into someone's (large size) Louis Vuitton purse. The impact made me fall on my butt, but the most embarrassing part was that her purse was hanging really low because of the way she was holding it. I wasn't even able to run into her boobs or her mid stomach area, but her waist. The tall girl quickly ran to me (I flew a few feet back somehow), and while I heard the clacking of her 6 inch heels coming my way, I was able to identify her as a sophomore from my school, named Cristina. We aren't really friends or enemies, but I would prefer if she didn't recognize me while I'm half my size.
"Oh my goodness, sweetie, I'm so sorry! I hope I didn't hurt you!" She started saying as she made her way towards me. I felt like I was really 4. She put one knee down in the ground and tried helping me up. I didn't want to say anything because I didn't want my voice to give away that I'm 13 years older than she thinks I am. But, as she continually tried helping me up, she found me out. "There, there, cutie. It's done now. Don't be hurt." I was really sweating at this point. "Come on, princess, give me your hand. I'll help you up, ok? I'm not here to hurt you." I had no other option than to give her my hand. Up until this point I was using my hair to hide my face. I eventually gave my hand, and she help me stand up. She brushed my hair out of the way and almost yelled "Amanda?!" but luckily she whispered it. Sarah, Destiny and Faith all made their way toward us. stood up, more than doubling our size, thanks to her 6 inch heels, making her 6 feet tall, looked at us (I saw her looking at me the most, mainly because my cleavage made it really sink in that it was us) and then asked how this was possible. We decided to go somewhere more quiet, so we followed her (only because her stride was naturally longer than ours) to a more secluded area. The whole time we were following her, I couldn't stop thinking about how her jeans are taller than I am.
Once we arrive to an area that makes it easier for her to hear us, she crouches down and begins talking. I quickly cut her off by asking "Cristina, please down crouch down to talk to us. I already feel tiny enough. Either take off your heels, or stand with them, please."
"Oh, sorry," she said genuinely. She stood up, although without taking off her heels. We explained everything thing to her and she offered to go around the mall with us and help us reach the taller clothes and whatnot. The girls and I ultimately decided…
11322111.title: Tiffany takes us with no problem

choices: We decided to try the My Size Barbie doll clothes
We decided to try regular clothes
113221111.content:
We all gratefully accepted her offer. As we started walking around, we were hoping no one from school would notice her, but her heels made her stick out above most people
It was practically impossible to see me and the other girls that shrank because we we're the size of people's legs. Since Cristina was only helping us, she mainly just followed us around, even though her strides put her ahead of us. We naturally walked into our favorite store, but Cristina said, "Wait, you guys aren't actually planning on buying things from here, are you?"
We all looked at each other and laughed. We didn't even think about it. It was just so natural. We walked out and passed a shoe store so I looked at Cristina and asked "Do you wanna stop here and buy some new shoes? It must be annoying to walk around in those giant heels."
"Ugh, I wish. I don't have any money, and I already have too many shoes. I was at a dinner with my family so I had to dress up."
We eventually get to GapKids and we started looking around for something we wouldn't actually mind wearing, before accepting that we had to wear anything that would fit. An attendant came up to Cristina and we could see the look of surprise and confusion on her face when she looked at us.
"Hi, welcome to GapKids, how can I help you?"
"Um, we're just looking around for now." Cristina replied. The way she was dressed looked like she could be a mother, but she still looked kind if youngish. She could pass of as a high school senior, maybe a college freshman, but anything else is not really believable.
"Ok, well, if you and your, er, daughter or daughters, need any help let me know." She raised her voice when she said daughters because she wasn't sure if they were related. Sarah and I are blonde, along with Destiny, but Faith is brunette, like Cristina. Faith, Hope, and Destiny are Colombian, and Cristina is Peruvian, so they kind of look alike. The triplets are all identical, as I've stated before, so the attendant probably thought Cristina was the mother of Faith, but then she noticed Faith and Destiny are identical so that's where the "daughters" probably came from. I don't know what she thought about Sarah and I though.
"Daughters? Oh, no! These aren't my daughters!"
"Oh, ok," said the attendant while laughing, "I couldn't tell if they were your daughters or your sisters!"
"Yeah, they're, uh, my sisters," Cristina said, while side hugging Destiny and Faith, while bending over, smushing their faces against her. She then came over to Sarah and I, picked me up and held me with one arm to her side, and kinda pushed Sarah against her massive leg and said "These are my friend's sisters." And, almost as if we were in a movie, her blonde friend came inside because she saw Cristina. The attendant walked away before she saw her so Cristina told her to go along and everything would be explained later. The attendant went to her usual spot, and came right back over when she saw Heather (the blonde friend.) and said "Ah, you must be the sister of the other two."
"Uh wh-" she started
"Yes! This is the other two's older sister. We're just here to buy some clothes for them. If we need anything, we'll let you know." We started looking around. Cristina stayed with me the most, because I had a class with her, so she kinda knew me the most. The most annoying part of being tiny in a kids store was all the real 3, 4, and 5 year old kids coming up to us and wanting to play. A lot of girls bigger than us came up to us and tried playing tag, but we refused to play, mainly because we were embarrassed. But the more we refused, the more aggressive they would get. The bigger girls started almost shoving us, and multiple times I fell. I tried not to get angry, but when I would go to stand up, I would have to look up at them because they were taller than me, and I would just try to ignore them,
Because they could easily dominate me because I was so small, even to them. Eventually, their mothers would come and tower both of us, and then mother would just drag her child away, and I would actually be happy because I didn't have some giant kid bothering me anymore. After about 25 minutes of looking, we all tried on some clothes, but nothing really fit right, for any of us.
Heather and Cristina went over to consult and me and the tiny girls sat on the floor of one of the dressing rooms and made a circle, to see if we could figure out why the clothes didn't fit.
"I think it's our boobs," I said.
"Well, what about our shorts? They're big too."
"Well, we're kinda scrawny for being four year olds. Like, because if cheerleading, we have thin waists/bodies." Faith explained.
"Sooo," Sarah started, "get shorts meant for three year olds, and shorts meant for five year olds?"
"Ugh, I hate shorts." I said
"Well, then, get dresses." Destiny replied. The door opened, revealing three ginormous girls. As I started looking up, I saw a giant Heather, who wasn't as tall as the giant attendant, who wasn't as tall as the giant Cristina. As this point we decided to tell the attendant, and Heather, what really happened.
"… so if we could see shorts for girls aged 3 years old, and shirts for a girl aged 5 years old, that's be great."
"Hmmm…" said the attendant, "you know, what you could do is go to the toy store, and buy those My Size Barbie doll clothes.
We thought for a little bit and decided…
113221111.title: We decide to accept her help

1132211111.content:
… that using the My Size Barbie clothes might be better than trying on kids clothes.
"How tall are they?" Cristina asked.
"I think they're about 36 inches or 38. Something like that."
Heather looked down at us and asked "how tall are you girls?"
"We think we're 35 inches."
"Oh, that's not bad then. Only up to a three inch difference." Heather said, while making her way to sit down on the little bench on the dressing room.
"Yeah, but when it comes to clothes, three inches for me," I started explaining, while turning around to face her, "is a lot different from three inches for you." Even though she was seated, she was still a lot taller than me.
"What do you mean?" She asked, standing up. "This is about three inches." She said, while hovering her hand 3 inches above me head. "Even with you being so tiny, that's not that much of a difference."
"Ok, but watch. Take those three inches and add them to the hem of your shirt." She added them to her shirt, and it went down to her mid thigh.
"Oh wow, that's actually a lot for me being 5'4"."
"Yeah, so now add them to me." I said. She took her giant hands and put them from the hem of my shirt and I simply said "wow, are you sure that's three inches?"
"Yeah, I didn't change it too much."
"Sorry," I said, "it's just that your hands are so massive." When she added the three inches, they went down to my knees. "See?" I asked.
"Yeah…," she replied. "I guess I didn't think about how three inches is a bigger "8percentage" of your size than it is mine."
"Well," Destiny said "do we want to go for the doll clothes then?"
"You little girls should be fine." Christina said. She crouched down to be our height and said "Look at these two photos of My Size Barbies. These dresses are for sale. Look at where they reach on the dolls (These are the pictures she showed me: http://goo.gl/7BDvJv and http://goo.gl/lTOsvo. Plus, like 5/6 of all postings I've seen about My Size Barbies have all been 36" dolls."
"Oo! This dress with hat matching hat is actually really cute!" I said. "Better than anything here."
The other girls also agreed
"So it's decided then; we go to a toys r u or another toy store and shop for clothes there?" The giant Heather said. "I'll drive us there. My jeep usually only fits two in the back, but you girls are most likely tiny enough to all squish in the back. If anything, someone can sit in Cristina's lap."
When we got to her Jeep Wrangler, the girls and I could almost walk under it because it was lifted so high. Cristina and Heather both opened the doors and pushed the seat back, waiting for us to get in.
"Uhh, Heather?" I said, while patting her thigh to get her attention away from whatever she was doing in her phone. "How do you expect us to get in?" I said, partially joking.
"Well, I didn't know if you tiny girls would have minded or not if we picked you up, so we didn't risk it. And, to be honest, I completely forgot you girls are so little." She and Cristina pack the back row with us four, and it was and little tight.
"You girls good back there?" Asked Cristina.
"Yeah, is there enough space?" Heather followed.
"It's a little tight, to tell you the truth." I replied (I know it seems like I'm the only one that does the talking between the four shrunken girls, but that's because I'm only repeating the most important parts).
"Well, you can come sit on my lap. That'll be more comfortable for the three back there and you're probably really light since you shrunk."
I was a little hesitant at first, but Sarah kept persisting me so I finally say on Cristina's lap. I looked at the clock, and it was still only 11:45 am. We drove off to Toys R Us to try and pick out some clothes for us.
1132211111.title: We decided to try regular clothes

choices: Realizes what's its like to be made fun of
13.content:
BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEP BE--!!!!
"6:30 already? I'm tired of school... Thank goodness it's already 4th quarter." I think to myself as I get out of bed. Life is getting to be such a boring routine. First, I wake up, and jump down from my oversized bed. Then I grab a towel, and head into the shower. By the time I get out it's 6:55. I grow from 4'10" to 6 feet so i can reach the top of my closet. I always think to myself, "how on Earth do I fit into these clothes? They're puny, they would fit around one of my legs in my current state..." So I shrink down, while whatever article of clothing that is currently in my hand goes from tiny and can be held with one hand, to big and needs to be held with both hands. "... Oh yeah, I'm ridiculously tiny..." I look up to the very same closet, that less than 10 seconds ago, was too small for me and it is now too big for me. I then dress myself in the usual : A skirt and a matching top, but not today. Today, I have to go in my cheerleading costume. Since I can shrink and grow some objects, I always make the outfit a little shorter than it should be. I then look at the full body mirror (For me, that is), that is 5 feet and a half tall, and proceed to make myself 5'9", because thats the height I was when I received my driver's license. If I were to drive as any height below 5'3", I couldn't drive that well. When I get to school, I stay 5'9" because I have a top locker. After, I get them, I shrink down to 4'10" and I can barely reach the lock.
School starts at 8 o'clock, I'm always ready before 7:40, so I hang out with my best friend. Her name is Cristina. She is 5'10" (Thanks to me. She was originally 4'6"). She always wanted to be tall, so I decided to do it for her. I love standing next to her because I have to look straight up at her. I am eye level with her boobs, but I don't mind, I shrink her when we're outside of school to the same situation anyways. She, too, is a cheerleader. She has long brown hair, and a long torso with long arms, and is dating a boy named Matt, who is 5'2". Cristina and I always take pics on game days. But I shrink myself so that I have to stand straight up, while standing on a bench, to be the same height as her. I love those types of pictures. We talk until basically the last possible minute. We have 4 classes together, out of 6. English, History, Cheerleading class, and Science. That's 1, 3, 4, and 6. We live close by and we usually switch carpooling days, today was my day so I picked her up (We live in the same neighborhood, about 3 houses down).
During cheerleading practice, I decided to play a 'little' joke on her. Everyone knows I can shrink myself and other people. Since I'm the smallest, I do all the stunts. But today I wasn't feeling too good, so I grew/expanded everyone to 5'10", and I made Cristina 4'1". She looked like a little 8 girl lost amongst all the legs of 18 year old girls. Everyone was getting revenge on her. She was the tallest cheerleader by 6 inches, and she always the girls midgets. So, since our coach wasn't here, I decided to mess around with my powers. Everyone was making fun of her (in a friendly manner), and she couldn't escape through all of the girls' ginormous legs. When I decided that they all had their fun, I returned them back to normal. Cristina...
13.title: Sydney

131.content: Knows I'm kidding. After all, I, accidentally, but her through worse. When I was 10, I made my 8 year old little sister 5'8". I myself was barely 4 feet tall (I was always extremely short.) I was still getting to know how to control my powers at that point. Later that week Cristina came over. We were talking and then I began to notice everything was getting smaller, and she was getting smaller twice as fast. I ended up 4'10" (That's why I choose to be that tall forever), and she was the size of my sister's Barbie Dolls (and that's why I like making other people Barbie size)! I stood there for a minute, trying to process what just happened. I picked up her and brought her to my face. Her clothes barely shrunk with her so I said "I need to get you some clothes that'll fit you, Barbie," and smiled. I put her on the pillow, and look through my stuff to see if I find any old Barbie Dolls laying around.
131.title: Flashback

1312.content:
I was searching for at least 5 minutes, high and low, for any Barbie Doll whose clothes I could give to Cristina. I finally remembered that in Paige's room she had our old collection of Barbies. The first and only box I picked out was the set containing all of the Holiday Barbie Dolls. My favorite ones were the 1991, 1994, 2000, 2002, 2007, 2009, and the 2010 Barbies, I choose those. She was bummed out that I only got dresses. Since I love big bows, I was considering the '91 Barbie dress, but I love the 2009 Barbie because there is giant ribbon that comes with the dress, making it seem like Cristina is shorter than she is. I ultimately decided to go with the 2007 Barbie. That was my favorite Barbie Doll because that was the first Holiday Barbie I ever got as a present. She was reluctant at putting on the dress at first, but seeing that I was almost 4 feet taller than her, and that I towered her, she had no other choice. Even though she knew these things to be true, she still refused. I wasn't to happy about that. So I picked her up with, what she described as, my massive hand. She tried running away, but due to her being under 1 feet tall, I easily caught her.
I grabbed her and took all of her giant clothes off. I put her in a box and I dropped the Barbie in there too. I went to the door and locked it. I went back to the box, took the dress off of Barbie, and gave her the tiny little dress.
"You have 5 minutes to put it on, or else I'll do it for you." She instantly tried putting it on. After three minutes, she told me that it kept falling. I thought it was because she was 10, and the dress was a strapless. "Ok, I'll try and shrink the dress." I said as I took her out of the box. I closed my eyes and tried. I focused, though I didn't necessarily know what to focus on. I opened my eyes, and all I saw was white. It took me a while to realize that I was in my own shirt! I shrunk myself too! But the amazing thing is is that I was able to shrink the dress the right size. "Oh no! I shrunk too!" I yelled! I heard Cristina trying to find me in my now massive shirt. After I got out I instantly ran to the dresses and picked up the '09 Barbie because it had a bow to tighten the dress so I wouldn't have to try and risk shrinking the dress again. As soon as I got it on, my ginormous little sister, Paige, walked in.
"Oh..., my... gosh...! Sydney... you look... ADORABLE!!!!! And Cristina, you're so cute!!" she yelled at the top of her lungs. Luckily, my mom wasn't home.
"Paige! Thank goodness! I don't know what happened but, I shrunk!!" I told her
"Obviously!" She said as she kneeled down in front of the bed to be eye level with us. "You're so... little! Like the size of a Barbie doll... you're so lucky. I always wanted to wear doll clothes. They're so much cuter than regular sized clothes." She sounded like she wanted to shrink too.
"I'll tell you what. If you help us return to normal, I'll learn how to use my powers and shrink you too!" I actually wanted to, mainly because I always thought she looked like a Barbie. Her, and my older sister Gina. They look exactly like each other, you'd think they were twins.
After a hour or two, we finally returned to normal.
1312.title: I find a doll

choices: I stay in the sun dress
13121.content:
After school Paige (5'6"), Cristina, and I find a surprise when we get home. Gina (5'3") is home from college! After talking for 1 and a half hour, the eldest Barbie looking daughter says "Oh, hey, Sydney, before I forget, I was wondering if you could shrink this dress for me. The lady at the checkout was must've thought I was insane when I showed up with a dress that fits a girl a foot taller than me!"
"Hahaha! Of course! No problem!" I said, while shrinking it.
"Oooh! Oooh!! Shrink me too! I wanna be the size of a doll again! It's been years! It's sooo much fun!" Paige is 15, so I'm surprised with her behavior. "Wait, actually let me go find a Barbie doll so I have something to switch in to when I'm tiny." She runs of into the garage.
"... She's 15 right? She sure doesn't act like it sometimes."
"I think I accidentally shrink her maturity some times." I say and we both laugh.
'I'm baaaaackk!!" Paige yells as she holds two dolls. One is wearing a blue and gold cheerleading outfit with "Barbie" written across the shirt, and the other has a red sweater, white shirt, jeans, and boots. Cristina went home an hour ago.
"Why'd you bring two...?" Gina asked confused.
"Well, silly, one for me, and I was gonna ask if you wanted to shrink too. Well, do you?" Paige asked, offering Gina the doll with the red sweater on. Gina thought about it for a while, and decided to do it, remembering that it has been years that she shrunk too.
"Ok, so stand next to each other, like shoulder to shoulder. Or whatever it is with you two." Since Paige is clearly taller than Gina, I shrank her three inches, then I shrank them both at the same time. Paige and Gina quickly changed into the doll outfits. "You two are so small! Even compared to me!" Even though I was less than 4 feet taller than them, they seemed like ants. Paige implored that I shrink too, seeing that it's rare for us three sisters to ever do something together. I decided to it considering she was right, and before I did I went to the garage.
Paige, chasing me with her little cheerleading outfit, said "You need to be at least 5'4" to reach the Barbies. You'll never get it in the tiny form you are!" She was right. I remembered unsuccessfully trying to get them before. I grew to 6 feet tall and Paige looked absolutely scared of how tall I was. "Oh, my gosh! Be careful not to step on us!" I could barely hear her. I got the cutest outfit I could find, which was a volleyball uniform, but I decided to go with a pink sundress. I was about to shrink when they told me to get a doll house, a bunch of doll clothes, and to lock the doors, close the blinds, and to turn on the lights. We decided to stay shrunken for the whole weekend, and couldn't grow back, or shrink anything else. Unfortunately, no one remembered to get their iPhones, so we're "stranded" with out any phones. Not only that, my phone was on top of my desk, in my room, on the second floor, Paige's was uncharged, and Gina's was on the counter, which towered over us. We decided to leave them be, or else we coud be breaking our promise of not shrinking anything else. But, Gina's phone went off, and it was our aunt, but we didn't find this out until much later. Because the counter was in no way reachable in the current shrunken state we were in, we had to try to scale it. After an hour of sisterly teamwork, and giant household objects to climb. When we finally made it atop of the counter, we realized that the phone was on the other side counter top. Normally, the gap is 8 or 9 feet wide. But to us little ones, it was like a ravine, or the Grand Canyon. We take a minute to decide what we're gonna do. We decide to go up to my room to see if the someone called me, because if they did, it was probably important. Gina said that the ringtone that went off was a "special" family ringtone. We were about to commence our descent when I noticed a broom on the side of the counter.
"Hey, guys! Let's slide down that broom!" We jogged over there and Paige yelled "I hate this outfit!! My boobs bounce around so much because it's a little big on me. Are you sure you made me 11.5 inches tall?? The Barbie doll's plastic breast seemed to be squished if anything!"
"Oh! It's 11.5 inches?? I thought it was a flat 10 inches instead! That would explain why this summer dress is too big!" I paused for a moment and made us bigger by and inch and a half. Well, actually just me and Paige. We stopped Gina to see how much taller we were. It looked like a foot! Not only that, but Paige's clothes and mine were much smaller and tighter now. I grew Gina to our size and everything seemed more "fitting" on her too. Her sweater was still a little big on her. For good reason too. When see took it off, her boobs were almost ripping the shirt. We were always more big breasted than most girls, reaching almost a D cup-size, but this? This was ridiculous. Not only for her. Paige's cheerleading outfit went from knee-high skirt, to really revealing, being up to her upper thigh, and the torso part was extending out so far. My strapless sun dress was really the only thing that fit properly. They decided to go down and change clothes.
13121.title: Continue with story

choices: I talk her our of it
She wants to go through with it
131211.content:
My sisters and I used the broom as a giant slide. After 15 seconds, we reached to floor. "So, what's the plan, girls? We change, and then head off to my room?"
"Well, I guess... but I mean can we even climb to the top of the desk...?" Paige asked while looking through the clothes. "I mean, we're less than a foot tall, and the desk is too big for you when your 4'10"."
"Oh, trust me, I know a way..." I said. "I've shrunken down so many times that I have... shortcuts."
"Well, another thing is being able to get the giant iPhone to work. I'm not in the mood to climb giant staircases, and have us three little midgets not being able to to unlock it or hear and talk on the phone properly" Gina said, while also shuffling through the clothes. "I don't understand... we're the same height as the dolls, why are these clothes small...?" She thought aloud. "Another thing is how much time we'll be wasting to go up there and do what we've set out to do. I mean, we're 11 inches tall! I could be using the time to get used to my small body, and the giant environment... Speaking of giant environments..." she said looking towards the massive fridge.
"Oh, I know what you're thinking. I put so much non-perishable foods in the houses. We're set on that." As I was looking thought the clothes, I found an old outfit, a silver, strapless top, and a black skirt attached, I lost years ago. "OH, MY GOSH!!! I've found it!! My favorite outfit!!! I knew I shrunk in it and grew back in Barbie clothes!" As I put it on, ( or try to) I notice it's small. "How can this be? I'm as tall as a doll. It should fit me fine!" I thought to my self. In the back I could Gina complaining saying "Ughhh, one thing about doll clothes is that the shoes are too limited." She tried putting on a pair of rubber shoes and she asks me, "Hey, Syd, are you sure you shrunk us down with Barbie's proportions? I remember that her shoes were able to fit me before and I haven't grown at all since the last time."
Paige, standing side by side with a doll agreed, saying "She has a point. Look, I'm taller than her." she says,  while pointing to the doll.
"I'm pretty sure I did, but I haven't done this in a while so I'm not exactly sure. Bring whatever clothes you want, there's a ruler in my room, we can use that as a tape measure when we get there."

10 minutes have passed by and we finally reached my room. Paige went through the trouble of bringing a doll all the way so we can have a doll to measure up to, but that's honestly the reason why we took so long. Gina and I grab the ruler, and measure Paige. She measured at a solid 12" inches. 
"See, you didn't use her proportions! Quick, try again!" Gina says. Still holding up the ruler, I close my eyes and focus on Gina, who is standing with her arms crossed, Paige, who has her hands on her waist, and myself. I feel my hand sliding down the ruler, and Paige yells, "It worked this time! I felt my waist shrink too!" She was always considered the prettiest of us three. She had big boobs (naturally, like Gina and myself), a big, round butt, and a perfect body. I was always jealous of it. Sometime, I was so jealous, I made her flatter than a wall on both sides one day.
"I felt it too. My hands moved down the ruler while I focused." 
"Yeah, our boobs got smaller too though. Now the clothes will fit perfectly fine." She was right. My dress was perfectly fine on my again, while Paige's spandex wasn't so tight because of her ass anymore. We almost forgot about the phone, until it rang again. A text message. We decided to scale up my desk, which proved a lot easier for Paige because she wasn't wearing heels like Gina and myself, or even a skirt or dress. "You guys are so dumb. Why would you dress up to go climbing??" she asked us.
"We... Uhh... Didn't think it... Through. Let's just... Leave it... At that." I said, in between breathes. We reached the Top and I had 6 missed calls, and at least 10 texts. The most recent one was from my little cousin, Sammy, who's 15. It said "Sydney??? Pick up!! This is important!! It's about your mother! She doesn't seem to good after that accident! Call back ASAP! Love you " Sammy is another cheerleader who goes to my school. She is one of the only people who are aware of my powers. I grow Paige back to normal because she wanted to talk to Sammy. She picked Gina up in one hand, and me in the other. She called Sammy and put it on speaker, while sitting on my bed, with her legs crossed, and putting Gina and I in the little gap formed by her legs. She calls and puts her on speaker. "Samantha!! What happened?!"
"You didn't hear?? Your mom crashed in an accident! It looks like... Well, it doesn't look like she's gonna make it." There was a long silence. Sammy finally broke it by saying "The, uh, doctors just announced her dead..." I look up, and tears are forming up in Paige's eyes. I climb out of her legs, and  try to hug her, but she was too massive to fully hug her. Gina sitting on her leg, crying. I start rubbing Paige's back (or the part I can reach) and a giant tear hits me. I look up, and two more are coming. They both hit me dead on.
"Sorry." Paige says, while sort of laughing. "Hey, Sammy, do you wanna come over. Like, now? It'll cheer us up." I forgot she was on the phone. I hear Sammy through the phone saying sure and Paige asks her to sleep over and etcetera.
After she hung up, Gina asked me to make her normal again, until Sammy arrived.  She went to her room and locked the door. Paige laid down on my bed and started crying. I walk up to her, and couldn't help but realize her massive French-braided hair is a big as I am. I sit on the pillow near her and start rubbing  her arm. She looked up and said, "You know, I've never realized how tiny you are. You can fit in so many places." Even though she was back to normal height, she still had Barbie proportions. "I just wanna grab you and play with you, your too cute when you're  that tiny!" Paige flipped sides, laying on her stomach. A few seconds later, she took off her tank top and threw it on me. I didn't know what was going on until I felt her get off my bed, and open the door. By the time I got out of under her shirt, she was back. She started cheer camp the same year I did, so she was better than me as a cheerleader. But, because she's a freshman, the school didn't want to make her a varsity cheerleader. She came back with her JV cheer leading outfit, my outfit (which was already shrunken), and the Barbie one. "Ok, pick either yours, or the Barbie's." I picked the Barbie one because I had no ideas was she was planning. She switched into hers and jumped back on the bed, which made me fall. She laid down on bed stomach again, and rested her ginormous breasts on me. "Could you do me the favor as to make me back to normal again?" she asked, even though it took a while for me to I understand what she meant. After 3 seconds I realized she meant the Barbie proportions. I returned to her regular self,  which didn't help the situation. Her boobs became bigger, which caused me to be squished even more. The only reason I didn't grow back was because I knew she was doing this to keep her mind off of our mother. She looks down at me and smiles. I don't know why she did, but I smiled back.
"Oh, Syd... Do you know that I actually wish I could the size of a doll forever? But when you shrink and I'm normal, I feel so... In control. Sort of like, if I want you to wear a bow, I can just pick you up, with the slightest ease, and put a bow in your hair. And since your so tiny, you can't do anything to stop me. But then I get jealous because you have the cutest little things to wear and it always look like your having sooo much fun, even when I try to make you look absolutely hideous, which, for the record, was only once." She got her massive breasts of me, allowing me to breath. Then she looked down again and said, "I guess what I'm trying to say is that I want you to shrink me, and all my clothes, and leaving me shrunken forever."
I instantly stood up and said "But, you always make fun of people for being shorter than you... How is that gonna turn out?? You'd be soo tiny. Kristin would have the time of her life with you, literally, in the palm of her hands!" Kristin is a 4'10" girl who as old as Paige. Paige always makes fun of her for being a foot a foot shorter than her. "Not only that, but how will you have kids and all that??"
"True... True..."
Eventually...
131211.title: I change too

1312111.content:
"Paige, if you do this, you'll lose your boobs and butt and everything!" I told her
"oh my gosh!! My boobs!" she said while cupping her breasts. "Well I still want to shrink! Make me like 4'6". I wanna be shorter than Kristin. I want a taste ste of my own medicine. I wanna know what it's like to be made fun of because you're so little." Kristin has two main best friends. Natalia who is 5'10" and Jackie who is 5'4". Despite being the shortest, Kristin is the "leader" of the group. None of the three like Paige at all, and I'm not really sure if I want to go through with this.
"Paige, let's be rational. Natalia, Jackie, and even Kristin will make so much fun of you! You'd be 4 inches shorter than her!" I yelled up at her. "I don't want to do this.. I really don't. But if you want too, who am I to stop you? It's your life."
"Yeah... you are completely right. It's my life. And you know what? YOLO." She said while laughing. I want to do this. When our little Barbie adventure is over, I want to shrink. My mind is made up." As soon as she said that, the someone knocked on the door. Paige instantly got up and ran towards it, leaving me on the enormous bed. Alone. I lay there, thinking of all the things that they would do to her one she becomes so short. I imagine Natalia taking her pack back and making it jump for it. Even Kristin doing something to make her feel short, like always standing next to her or making fun of how small her hands, feet, or even clothes are. Kristin always 3 inch heels to school so she'll be 5'1", so I can imagine her using something about heels too. Something like "Only those 6 inch stripper heels will make you five feet tall. You should start wearing them; it'll prepare you for the future." As I finish thinking, Sammy, Gina, and Paige all come back. Sammy is wearing a very small purple dress, reaching up to her upper thigh, and it's very tight around her boobs, making them seem even bigger than other really are. She's also wearing 4 inch heels, making her 6'4". Paige and Gina look extremely short next to her, especially since she has the longest, and nicest pair of legs you'll ever see.
"Sydney!! I don't remember you being that short! I grow myself back to normal, but it really isn't that much of an improvement. She is still gigantic, with her legs being almost half my body. She bends over to be face to face with me and we both start laughing at how different our heights are. "I really got the tall genes from you guys, didn't I?" She says, while standing normally again.
"Hahaha yeah, lucky little girl." Gina says.
"Little? I'm like twice your size!" She then proceeds to stand by her side, showing her height domunace of Gina.
"Sydney, Gina, and I were just gonna spend the weekend as the size of Barbie dolls, like we all used too in the old days. Do you wanna join? It'll be fun!" Paige asks.
"Being less that a foot tall and the same height as you guys? Yeah, I guess I could give being a giantess a break, and be roll sized again." Sammy's long, blonde hair reaches up to her butt, and is The nicest hair ever. Everyone is jealous of it. It almost seems like Barbie's hair, so everyone always called her Barbie as a child. "But can I shrink down wearing heels too? These are my favorite pair and I don't want them to almost be as big as me." She explains.
"Well, yeah, I guess but I thought we were gonna use Barbie clothes again?" I asked.
"Oh yeah! That's right! I forgot about that! Well what are you gonna shrink down with us?"
"Well, whatever you want and need. But be wary, once we shrink down, I won't shrink anything else." I explained to her. She got everything she needed in about 3 minutes. While she was preparing with Gina's help, Paige asked me.to shrink her to 4'6" and all of her stuff down as a "preview" of what life'll be like. I wasn't used to being taller than her. It was truly an odd experience. Sammy walked in when she was done, and she towered over us. I never got used to how long her legs were. They always amaze me. They are perfectly toned, extremely long, and I often hear girls say they want her legs. They are one of her best features. I shrunk Gina and Paige first. Then I began shrinking Sammy but I did so in increments. first I stopped when she was 6' tall, her original height. She still towered over me with those enormous legs. Then I stopped her at my height, I was finally able to look her in her blue eyes. Then I shrunk her to where she was half my size, where I had to bend over in order to be face-to-face with her.
"You're having waaay to much fun with this! Oh my gosh!! My voice! It's so... so squeaky!! I feel so little now!!" She exclaimed, with the biggest smile on her face." Don't stop now! Shrink me more!" And so I did. I shrunk her to where she was Barbie sized. So then I shrunk myself. "Wow! Even when I'm Barbie sized I'm tall!" She said while standing side by side with me. "I love my heels! Don't they make my legs seem much longer? Unfortunately I'm gonna have to take them off to wear Barbie clothes." She said, sorta bummed out.
"Well, now we begin our adventure!" I exclaimed, as we take into account the giant surroundings.
"I feel so little. I'm not used to being so small!" Sammy said, in awe, as we all laughed.
1312111.title: I talk her our of it

13121112.content:
The weekend zoomed by, and it was time for us to go back to school. Sammy, Paige, and I go to the same high school, and Gina goes to college nearby. Since the entire weekend Sammy was shrunken, she had to go to school with the same attire she came over our house with; the purple dress, and the 4 inch heels. When we arrived, Paige seemed extremely nervous.
"You know I can make you big again right? This isn't permanent; you don't have to do this. Besides, I'm sure everything will go well if you stay that height too. If anything, you two will become best friends because you're both so short " I said that last part as a joke, but the rest was supposed to reassure her.
"Yeah Paige don't do this. You're almost two feet shorter than me. I feel like a giant."
"Sammy, you're a giantess regardless!!" Paige said, looking straight up at her. "I don't think one foot would make a difference."
"Ok, well, here we go. I guess" I said. I couldn't wait for school to end..where Paige'll finally admit she's wrong.
13121112.title: Skip to Monday

choices: Later at home, Paige's POV still
131211122.content:
As I walked through the double doors, I saw everything much bigger than they should be. I thought to myself that this was a bad ideas as soon as I saw Kristin 5 minutes later. I tried to hide my face, but I know it was no good when I heard the tapping if her heels coming towards me. First I felt a big shove, knocking me down, and my books too. I like up to see her laughing and mocking me.
"What happened Paige? Did you fall in the dryer?" Followed by the laughter of the three. I wanted to tell her that I told my sister to do this, but that would reveal her secret.
"Um, a science experiment gone wrong, if you will?" I tried to play it off. How could I have been so foolish?! Not to think of an excuse. Luckily I managed to BS my way around this one.
"We didn't really care you know? I'm just showing you how it feels like to be made fun of, you little brat." She said in a rude manner. Is this really how I treated her? I feel like a horrible person. "Natalia, Jackie, I got this. Thanks. I'll catch up with you guys later. Let me have some fun with wittle Paigy over here." As they walked off, I saw Kristin shift her gaze towards me. She squatted down, picking my books up for me. I was in shock. "Sorry for pushing you. Natalia shoved me. She thinks she can do whatever she wants because she's 5'10". And Jackie only encourages her. They annoy me sometimes." She helped me up and said, "Wow! Just how tall are you, anyways?!? I actually seem tall next to you!! You know, granted I'm wearing heels."
I was barely able to utter a word. "Uhh, umm, uh..." I was dumbfounded. "4'6". Yeah, that's right, 4'6"..."
"Oh no... what happened??" She asked. She seemed genuine in asking.
"I, uh, don't really know." I said.
"Aw man. Wow, this reminds me of 2nd grade. I was taller than you, we were best friends. Whatever happened between us?"
"We grew apart, I guess." I said, walking in the direction of our first class. For some reason we have every class together.
"Well, you did all the growing! I stayed behind. I miss those days. Those two make me be mean to you. They said they'll "ditch my midget ass" if I'm not. Tell me, is this permanent?" She asked. I was finding out so much about her because of this.
"...Yeah. Possibly." I said. I can get used to this.
"Well, this may seem a little upfront, but... do you think that we can maybe..." she said, bit by bit. "Never mind. It was a silly idea." I wanted to ask her what she wanted but Sammy came up behind us and said "Paige?? With... with Kristin? What a miracle!"
I thought I knew where Kristin was going with that question, show I said, "Yup! We realized the silly little feud we had going on was just a misunderstanding, so we gladly put it behind ourselves, and we're friends again. Right, Kristin?" Iooked up at her, smiling.
"Of course! Just like back in elementary school!" She said, looking down at me, with a warm smile. Sammy smiled down at us and left to go to her class. I stood on my tippy toes to see how short I ray was and Kristin still seemed tall, even.though I had gained about 3 inches or so.
"Wow, maybe shrinking one foot was too much." I thought to myself.
"Oh my gosh! I love that dress! You probably don't know this but at Emily's party, when.you were changing, I tried that dress on. It was HUGE on me! I can't believe it shrunn too... how'd that happen?"
"Well, my sister and I managed to shrink some clothes in dryer luckily this dress shrank too." She was.still looking at my blue sundress. "And.if you try the dress on now, it'll probably look slutty on you because it'll be so small!" Kristin is bleach blonde, and.her hair seems extremely bright compared to my dirty blonde hair. Her butt is quite big, especially since she always wears heels, which makes it stick out even more.
As Kristin and were walking to class, she said "Do you really think that it'll be small on me? I really love it ."
"Well... you're 4 inches taller than me. Its sorta big on me, so maybe just a little?"
"Let's go find out!" She takes my hand and starts running to the bathroom. She finds an open handicap stall (The larger ones) and starts taking off her outfit, which I loved. "Take your dress off, quick."
"Won't we be late to class...?" I didn't really mind, as I took off my dress anyways.
"Oh who cares? We have A's in that class. Here, try this out." She handed me her skirt, shirt, and even her heels. I took off my sandles as well, and gave it to her along with my dress. "Oh my gosh! Your feet fit in my heels?? I have such small feet!" She put my dress on, then my sandles and said "Wow, your sandles fit me perfectly. You must've always had big feet because I doubt you managed to shrink these sandals in the washer too!"
"Hahaha, well those are my eldest sister's. She was home from college and was nice enough to let me keep them." I quickly said. After a minute or so, we finally got finished putting each other's clothes on. Her clothes were slightly big on me, and my dress was indeed to small for her. I asked her if she wanted to switch back, but she said she wanted to see how long she would last before getting in trouble. "Wow, I'm really short... even with your heels on, we're not the same height."
"Aww, well it's ok! You look really cute that short anyways." I honestly don't know if she was just saying that or if she was honest. "I have a quick question for you... What're you gonna do with cheerleading now? I imagine your uniform is too big? Or did you manage to shrink that in the dryer too?" I didn't reply. Instead, I took out the bottoms and held it up against myself. "Oh wow! That looks huge! Did that really use to fit you?!"
"Yup, and believe it or not, it was actually small on me."
"No way! That's looks so big... I'm so sorry you shrunk."
"Don't be! It's not your fault." I quickly said.
"I mean, I know that. But, you're so little know, you make me look tall. That must suck, especially cause you were so tall before."
"Nah... It's fine. Really. If anything I'm glad it happened."
"What? Why?"
I finally realized that we were still in the bathroom, so I said "Listen, let's go back to my place. I don't wanna spend the entire first hour in the bathroom! I'll tell you everything there and on the way." Kristin was 16 already so she had already gotten her license. After we managed to sneak out and make it to her car, I began telling her why I was glad I decided to shrink. "You may or may not know this, but I don't have too many close friends... But when you helped me get up, and were nice to me, I... I sort of had hope that we would be best friends again. I mean I know it's a long shot, especially cause of Jackie and Natalia, but, I remembered elementary school and hoped we could have something like that again... Can I ask you something?"
"Yes, of course you can! But before you do, let me explain why everything changed. As you know, I was befriended by Jackie and Natalia, but they literally forced me to be mean to you. They said I wouldn't be cool if I didn't, and you know kids in middle school will do anything to fit in. I'm so sorry, I wanted to be friends with you again, but by the time that the magnitude of what I'd done had sunk in, you were already not talking to me. You were making fun of me. I'm in no way angry at you for that, I mean, I understand why you did that. I also understand its completely my fault. And today, when I say you, I know they were gonna make fun of you. I saw that as an opportunity to maybe be friends with you again. And hopefully it worked! So what were you gonna ask?"
"Aww, Kristin I really missed you. And I was just gonna why you gave me a second chance, but you already answered that."
"So what do you say, we put all this behind us?"
"Of course... That sounds perfect!"
131211122.title: Her P.O.V.

1312111221.content:
"WHAT!? You're sister can make things smaller and bigger!? That must be why I see a giant girl who looks exactly like her. And that explains how you shrunk!"
"Yup. I asked her to shrink me. And, uh, it's also the reason you're so little too..."
"What do you mean?? You asked your sister to shrink me!?"
"Yes. Kristin I'm so sorry. It was a long time ago, I complete forgot about it until recently too. But don't worry, in compensation for shrinking you, I asked her to do something nice to your body, if you know what I mean." I said, making a circular motion with my hands around her boobs and her ass. "And the reason you eat so much, but stay so skinny? She was also nice enough to give you "permanent" curves. So, as horrible as this may sound, it's not all that bad."
"That explains so much! Like why my 11 year old little sister is taller than me. Do you know what it's like to have your sister who is 5 years younger than you out grow you and give you all her clothes? But at least I do have a nice body. I wonder how tall I'm supposed to be normally though."
Surprisingly, she wasn't angry at all. "Well Sydney should be home in a little bit. Maybe we can see then." We heard a car door close outside and I said "Or now, I guess." The door opened about a minute later and Gina came through it. "Gina? I thought you were a college? "
"Well, now that mom is gone, some one has to take care of you two." She said I got up to hug her, but I was astounded by how tall she was in her 4 inch heels. "I'm gonna need help getting my stuff from the car... Oh my goodness. Is that Kristin?! I haven't seen you in forever!"
"Geez, Gina. You didn't have a taller pair of heels to wear?" I said, as we stopped hugging, and Kristin made her way towards us.
"Haha, well you never seemed to care before... Uh, before the "accident" happened." She said, trying not to blow what really happened.
"Well, before it only made you an inch taller than me, not a foot and an inch! Oh, and Kristin knows, I told her."
"Oh... So she knows everything?"
"Yup. Even that she's so short because I asked Syd to make like that."
"Is Sydney ok with that?" She asked, while looking at Kristin. We then all heard another car door slam.
"Well, I guess we're about to find out..." I said. About 10 seconds later, Syd walks through the door and is surprised to see Kristin here.
"Wow... Kristin?? Um, I didn't expect you to be here, no offense. It's just that I didn't imagine you would be the friend Paige went home with."
"Haha it's fine. I completely understand. It's not like I planned on being here either!"
Gina quickly interrupted saying "Awwww, it's like a little midget re-union! All you guys are below 5 feet tall, this is so cute!" She was actually towering over us for once.
"Err-- So, Syd... I may or may not have told Kristen about your special abilities..." I said, hoping she wouldn't be mad.
"Eh, it's fine... As long as you're sure we can trust her. And if we cant, well, I'll just have to shrink her down to doll size and leave her that way." Sydney said, jokingly.
"Hahaha, yeah, I'm sure we can trust her. But, we were sorta wondering how tall she was supposed to be? Remember, I asked you to make her really small all the way back when I was in 6th grade?"
"Oh, yeah.. I remember.. Um, ok. Kristin, want me to make you normal size?"
"Yes please! I wanna see how tall I really am!"
"Well, ok. But, if your family is really tall, you may outgrow that dress..." She said. Before anyone had a chance to reply, Kristin was growing right before our eyes. Or, at least her height was. Her ass and boobs began shrinking, and her curves were going away, even though se remained pretty skinny.
"Hey! What are you doing? I wanted just my height!"
"I'm not doing anything. I'm returning you to your normal body. This is how you were supposed to be."
After she was completely done growing, she was over 6 feet tall, and the dress was hardly covering her.
"Oh my gosh!! Kristin! You're absolutely giant!!" I yelled. I was surprised at how tall she was supposed to actually be.
"I... I know! I'm huge! I feel so tall! But, I'm also almost flat and have no ass!" This was true. She was hardly a B cup if anything, and her ass was hardly noticeable. "Uh... could you do me a favor and..."
"Yeah, I got you." Sydney said, while laughing. She restored her boobs and ass back, along with her curves.
"Ahh, much better. Now as to how your dress still fits me, Paige, is beyond me. I'm like twice your size! I think most of it went to my legs though... that's probably the dress became so revealing."
"Paige, do you want to go back to normal height? Just for a minute?" Sydney said, making herself normal height. Surprisingly, she was only 5'2".
"Uhh, sure. I guess." I felt my self grow taller, and Kristin clothes become smaller and more tight on me.
"Well, so much for me feeling tall..." Gina said, while taking off her heels.
"Yeah, I really don't like being this tall. I feel like I'm never gonna find a guy."
"Hahaha, I feel you. Syd, shrink us down again?"
"Already? Fine, ok." As Sydney shrunk us down, Kristin asked to remain a giant. I invited Kristin to my room, and when we got there, she hardly fit through the door.
"Wow... Your room looks the same from all those years back! Except, it's a lot smaller than I remembered..." She sat down on my bed.
"Oh, gee, I wonder why it's so small..."
"OH! I honestly completely forgot!" We both laughed at the fact she actually forgot she isn't 4'10" anymore. We started comparing our heights, and we both were amazed at the differences every time. After a while, we began looking through my closet. "Wow! All your clothes seem so little!"
"Little?! These are absolutely huge now!" As I literally stood at Kristin's waist, we both began wondering how tall she really was. "I wonder how tall you really are... Hold up. Let me look for a tap measure." After about a minute or so, I found one. "Ok, since you're like twice my size, I think you should measure me first." As I handed her the tape measure, she began to kneel down to make it easier.
"Uhmm... Yeah, 4'6", just like you said. You shrunk a whole foot! Here, now do me! Or, try to at least ha ha." She handed me the tape measure and I began attempting to measure her. I put on my tallest pair of heels, which were 6 inches, and still had trouble. "Why don't you get on a bed? That'll make it easier!" So I did just that.
"You are absolutely giant! You stand 2 feet taller than me at 6'6"! You would have been one of the tallest people at school." I yelled. I felt really small because I had to stand on a bed, and I still wasn't as tall as her. "Honestly, how you fit in my little dress is beyond me."
"I think she might've enlarged it because when I put this on it was for a girl two feet shorter than me! Here, I'll put something else on, and you put this on. Or, at least try to." After she found setting more comfortable, she handed me my dress. Right off the bat, I knew something was funky. It seemed a lot larger. I put it on and I felt like a little girl playing dress up in her older soster's clothes.
"Yeah, definitely bigger" I said, as I stood there, with one strap on my shoulder and the dress covering up to my shins. We both laughed as we continued to look thorough my closet. I found my dress that I was gonna wear for my sweet 16. I had completely forgotten that within a month it was my birthday. I attempted to pull it out but it was too high up, even though I was still wearing my six inch heels. "Hey, Kristin. Do me a favour and get that blue dress for me?" Kristin, with the slightest ease, got my dress out and gave it to me. My dress was a strapless blue ball gown. Or, at least it was. As I held it up to my body, it was taller than I was ( without heels on). I didn't want to admit it, so I tried putting it on, and the part that was supposed to be at my boobs went completely over my head. "Aww no way! This was supposed to be my sweet 16 dress." I said, really bummed out it doesn't fit.
"Yeah, I don't see how you're supposed to wear a dress that's taller than you are." Kristin easily slipped the dress off over me, and began putting it on herself. "Luckily, you're sister can shrink it!" After she put it on, it only went up to her...
1312111221.title: Later at home, Paige's POV still

info.brief_description: I am a high school girl, with the ability to shrink or grow myself and/or others.
info.description:
In this story, you get to pick on which person you want to follow, Amanda, a 5'10' blonde girl, who takes pride in being tall, or Sydney, a 4'10 blonde girl who likes makes people being shorter than her.

Amanda- Standing at 5 feet 10 inches tall, is one of the tallest girls in her grade, mainly due to the fact that she shrinks all the other girls. She has long, blonde hair, that reaches up to her stomach. She is a C cup-size, and really long legs. She is a trustworthy person when you get to know her. She is also a cheerleader, and really popular. She is very pretty, and a lot of guys fall for her, but she is yet to find the right guy. She is also a Junior in high school. She lives in New York.

Sydney- Measuring at a mere 4 feet 10 stature, she loves making girl smaller than her. She makes them either the size of her legs, which are pretty long for her tiny size, or the size of Barbie Dolls. She, too, has C cups,long blonde hair, up to her chest, and is a really nice and caring person, when she isn't shrinking you. Despite the fact that she is a Sophomore, she is well known around the school. She plays club volleyball, and is quite good, even though she is very petite, and a cheerleader at school too. She isn't dating anyone, but, she too, is very pretty. She lives in Massachusetts.

They both like to go out with friends every moment possible, wearing skirts or dresses and heels. They come from wealthy families, who are unaware of the origins of their super-powers, because they never had super-powers themselves. (Will add more details later.)




*****PLEASE NOTE: Title is subject to change. This is a temporary title, due to the lack of a better idea. If you have a better idea, don't be afraid to share :) I am open to any and all ideas. *****
